buttons

Class TextButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • buttons.Button
      • buttons.TextButton

  • public class TextButton
extends Button
    Subclass of Button. Represents an adjusted TextButton with rounded corners for the rectangle that is the button's clickable window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new TextButton object with the following parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextButton

        public TextButton(float x,
                  float y,
                  float width,
                  float height,
                  java.awt.Color tcol,
                  java.awt.Color bcol,
                  java.lang.String text,
                  int size)
        Creates a new TextButton object with the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the button
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button
        tcol - the color of the button's text
        bcol - the color of the button
        text - the text to be displayed inside the button
        size - the font size of the text
